verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* unto thee \w the|strong="H0853"\w* finest \w and|strong="H1121"\w* dearest \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w olives|strong="H2132"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* furnish \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*,

Without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* covenant. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w set|strong="H4150"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5704"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* service \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rite \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* set \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* most \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* candlestick \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

Thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* hour, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* shalt \w bake|strong="H0644"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* leaves thereof, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenths shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w loaf|strong="H2471"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* another \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* most \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dearest \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3117"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* changed \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w being|strong="H1121"\w* received \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H0801"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w right|strong="H0175"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* behold \w there|strong="H8432"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H0376"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*, \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fell|strong="H3318"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* words \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* blasphemed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* \w it|strong="H7043"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: (\w now|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H8034"\w* Salumith, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Dabri, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*:)

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w put|strong="H3240"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w prison|strong="H4929"\w*, till \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* know \w what|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

Saying: \w Bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* blasphemer without \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* let \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w put|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H8085"\w* \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* curseth \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* blasphemeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w dying|strong="H4191"\w* let \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*, whether \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w native|strong="H0249"\w* \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* blasphemeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w dying|strong="H4191"\w* let \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* striketh \w and|strong="H0376"\w* killeth \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w dying|strong="H4191"\w* \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5221"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* killeth \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* make \w it|strong="H7999"\w* good, \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* say, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* give \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* giveth \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* neighbours: \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*:

Breach \w for|strong="H8478"\w* breach, \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* restore. \w What|strong="H0834"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* compelled \w to|strong="H5414"\w* suffer.

\w He|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H0929"\w* striketh \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* render \w another|strong="H0120"\w*. \w He|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H0929"\w* striketh \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* punished.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* equal \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* among \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, whether \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w or|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w native|strong="H0249"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* offends: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* blasphemed, without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w stoned|strong="H7275"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
